EmailTemplate.description: Email template for emailing the owner of a CI that it is in the AM Follow Up status.
EmailTemplate.name: Notify Owner of CI
EmailTemplate.subject: Customer Inquiry - AM Follow Up: {!Customer_Inquiry__c.Account__c}, {!Customer_Inquiry__c.Call_Bucket__c} - {!Customer_Inquiry__c.Call_Type__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
An inquiry from your dealer, {!Customer_Inquiry__c.Account__c}, has been set to AM Follow Up and is ready for you to take action.
Please review the ticket notes and close, when ready. {!Customer_Inquiry__c.Link}
640 Ellicott St #321 Buffalo, NY 14203 www.acvauctions.com
Want to change how you receive these emails? You can update your preferences or unsubscribe.
